body.p: Born in 1811 in Kentucky. Married to Elizabeth C. Watts. Children included Kate W., Mattie H., Eli M., Thomas P., and Elijah P., Promoted to lieutenant-colonel of 2nd regiment Kentucky Cavalry on November 25, 1862.

bibl.p: J. H. Battle, W. H. Perrin, & G. C. Kniffin, Kentucky: A History of the State (Louisville:Battey Publishing, 1885), 720; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Fourth Ward, p. 13.
